Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,113 @@ +import React, { useState } from "react"; +import DashboardSidebar from "../../components/DashboardSidebar"; +import CompanySettings from "./tabs/CompanySettings"; +import FoundingSettings from "./tabs/FoundingSettings"; +import SocialSettings from "./tabs/SocialSettings"; +import AccountSettings from "./tabs/AccountSettings"; + +const tabs = [ + { id: "company", label: "Company Info" }, + { id: "founding", label: "Founding Info" }, + { id: "social", label: "Social Media Profile" }, + { id: "account", label: "Account Setting" }, +]; + +export default function SettingsPage() { + const [sidebarActive, setSidebarActive] = useState("Settings"); + const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("company"); + + // flat state: logo/banner are preview URLs (strings) + const [data, setData] = useState({ + logo: "API", + banner: "", + companyName: "", + about: "", + orgType: "", + industry: "", + teamSize: "", + year: "", + website: "", + vision: "", + socials: [ + { platform: "facebook", url: "" }, + { platform: "twitter", url: "" }, + ], + mapLocation: "", + phoneCountry: "+91", + phone: "", + email: "", + currentPassword: "", + newPassword: "", + confirmPassword: "", + }); + + const update = (patch) => setData((prev) => ({ ...prev, ...patch })); + + const saveChanges = () => { + // replace with API call + console.log("Saved settings:", data); + alert("Save (console) - replace with API call"); + }; + + return ( +
